overview:
Broken Arms Games is a young independent team, born from a strong passion for the world of videogames. After many collaboration for big companies, Giulio, Elisa and Yves decide to join their forces!

B.A.G. project become real after more then 5 years of experience in mobile gaming and free to play games. Now we propose ourself with a big knowledge of the new platforms, like Samsung Smart tv, BB10 and also the classic one IOs, android,BlackBerry, PC e MAC.

Our mission is to participate actively in global gaming industry, offering a fresh and dynamic team always with new ideas. Our motto (“Play your life”) reflects exactly our approach to problems, especially in finding the best solutions, whether design or/and structure, and fully satisfy the expectations of the video game market.

Passion doesn’t know boundaries …
